abort.already_configured: That API key has already been registered.  Please use 'add new journey' to add one or more journeys instead.

error.apiratelimitexceeded: API rate limit exceeded - wait a moment and try again
error.stoperror: At least one invalid stop ID

user.description: Enter your Transport NSW API key.  If you don't have one you can register [here](https://opendata.transport.nsw.gov.au/data/user/register).
user.title: Transport NSW MKII

finished.description: Created initial configuration for {name}.  Now add your journeys!

finish.description: Created initial configuration for {name}.  Now add your journeys!

abort.already_configured: You have already added that journey.
abort.outbound_already_configured: You have already added that journey.
abort.return_already_configured: You have alreadty added the return part of that journey
abort.title: test title placeholder

data.origin_id: The stop ID of your start point
data.destination_id: The stop ID of your destination

user.description: Provide the details of the journey you want to monitor.  Stop IDs can be searched for [here](https://transportnsw.info/routes/train#/).  You can also have the return journey created in addition to the outbound journey if required.
user.title: Transport NSW MKII

data_description.route_filter: Filter out journeys whose origin 'line name' or 'short line name' don't contain this text

data.trip_wait_time: The minimum time from now to wait before the journey starts (minutes)

settings.description:
Select the appropriate transport types and optional route filter.  Only journeys with origin and destination legs that start and end with your selected transport types will be considered valid, so if you don't mind a little bit of a walk at either end (getting off at Gadigal Station and walking to Town Hall Station for example), make sure you select 'Walk' as an option.

If you specify a route filter, only journeys with that text in the line name (eg T9 Northern Line) or short line name (eg T9) will be shown.
settings.title: {journey_name}

data.alerts: Include alerts related to each journey
data.trips_to_create: How many trips should be shown (1 to 3)

sensors.description: Here you can choose if an alerts sensor should be created, how many consecutive journeys should be created and what types of sensors each journey should include.
sensors.title: {journey_name}

data.alert_types: Select which types of alerts should be included.

alerts.description: Alerts of the selected severity and above are shown.
alerts.title: {journey_name}

origin_sensors.name: Origin sensors
origin_sensors.description: Select which origin/first leg-related sensors to create

data.origin_line_name: First leg line name (eg T1 North Shore & Western Line)
data.origin_line_name_short: Short version of first leg line name (eg T1)
data.origin_occupancy: First leg vehicle occupancy (eg Many seats, few seats etc)
data.origin_name: Origin name (eg Gordon Station, Platform 1, Gordon)
data.first_leg_device_tracker: Device tracker based on first leg vehicle location (if provided)

data.destination_line_name: Last leg line name (eg T9 Northern Line)
data.destination_line_name_short: Short version of last leg line name (eg T9)
data.destination_name: Destination name (eg Gadigal Station, Platform 1, Sydney)
data.destination_occupancy: Last leg vehicle occupancy (eg Many seats, few seats etc)
data.last_leg_device_tracker: Device tracker based on last leg vehicle location (if provided)

options.if_not_duplicated: Only if different to the origin
